    Professional Work

    Senior Research And Development Engineer

    Company Name: IPsoft
    Dates Employed: Jun 2016 – Jul 2019
    Employment Duration: 3 yrs 2 mos
    Location: Ballari, Karnataka, India

    Responsibilities

    • Developed end to end stochastic dialogue management for our cognitive agent, Amelia, which was the first in the industry that could shift conversations and jump from one context to another.
    • Worked on developing an engine to support the Business Process Network (BPN) module of our cognitive agent Amelia.
    • Developed end to end Robotic Process Automation product called 1RPA, which introduced out of the box features unique to the Automation Industry. The solution was implemented for over 20 clients across the globe. In its first year of offering it earned over $1 million in revenue.
    • Mentored and managed a pair of developers for feature building and bug-fixing.
    • Managed QA team for 1RPA which involved tracking JIRA and sprint planning.

    Software Engineer

    Company Name: Samsung Electronics
    Dates Employed: Jul 2015 – Jun 2016
    Employment Duration: 1 yr
    Location: Bengaluru Area, India

    Responsibilities

    • Working on Graphics Engine Enhancement for tizen.
    • Worked on IoT middleware
    • Worked on network stack , implemented trickle module ,logging system and testing of the stack using test tools.
